Testing VPSUBD instruction
=========================
Test 1: 128-bit basic functionality
Input: 1000000000 -2000000000 300000000 -400000000 
Subtrahend: 500000000 -1000000000 200000000 300000000 
Result: 500000000 -1000000000 100000000 -700000000 
Expected: 500000000 -1000000000 100000000 -700000000 
[PASS]

Test 2: 128-bit memory operand
Input: 2147483647 -2147483648 0 1 
Subtrahend (mem): 1 1 1 -1 
Result: 2147483646 2147483647 -1 2 
Expected: 2147483646 2147483647 -1 2 
[PASS]

Test 3: 256-bit AVX operation
Input: 1000000000 -2000000000 300000000 -400000000 500000000 -600000000 700000000 -800000000 
Subtrahend: 500000000 -1000000000 200000000 300000000 400000000 -500000000 600000000 700000000 
Result: 500000000 -1000000000 100000000 -700000000 100000000 -100000000 100000000 -1500000000 
Expected: 500000000 -1000000000 100000000 -700000000 100000000 -100000000 100000000 -1500000000 
[PASS]

VPSUBD tests PASSED
